Package core

Class Scene

java.lang.Object
core.Scene
All Implemented Interfaces:
IScene
Direct Known Subclasses:
ListUsers, LoginScene, ManageUsers, MenuScene, OrderConstruction, ProfileSettings, RegisterScene, ShowProfile, ViewConstruction
public class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScene
Scenes are parts of the GUI. They are the frame which the program will render on the main drawing pane. It contains information about its elements, sprites, menuBars. It also contains methods for the scene manager to run while changing scenes. There is a method to be run before,during and after the activation of the scene.

    • updateMenuBar

      public void updateMenuBar​(boolean isActiveAdmin)
      Method for updating the menubar. If the user an admin, extra elements will be shown. However the app wont show any menubar in a few selected scenes.
      Parameters:
      isActiveAdmin - Boolean for returning weather the logged user is an admin
